body:
{
"title":"Charming Downtown Loft with Stunning City Views  Welcome to your cozy retreat in the heart of downtown! Our modern loft offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, making it an ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers.  The Space This spacious loft features:  Open Concept Living Area: A beautifully furnished living space with large windows that let in plenty of natural light, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline. Comfortable Sleeping Arrangements: A plush queen-sized bed with premium linens, plus a sofa bed to accommodate extra guests. Fully Equipped Kitchen: Stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and all the essentials you need to prepare your favorite meals. Modern Bathroom: A clean, stylish bathroom with a walk-in shower, fluffy towels, and complimentary toiletries. Workspace: A dedicated area with a desk and high-speed Wi-Fi, perfect for remote work. Amenities High-Speed Wi-Fi Smart TV with Streaming Services Washer and Dryer Air Conditioning and Heating Free On-Site Parking Guest Access Guests have exclusive access to the entire loft, ensuring complete privacy during your stay. You'll also have access to the building's fitness center and rooftop terrace, where you can unwind and enjoy panoramic views of the city.  Neighborhood Located in a vibrant neighborhood, our loft is just steps away from:  Popular Restaurants and Cafés: Savor local cuisine and coffee at nearby eateries. Shopping: Explore boutique shops and major retail stores within walking distance. Cultural Attractions: Visit museums, theaters, and galleries that showcase the city's rich culture and history. Public Transportation: Easy access to bus and subway lines, making it simple to explore the rest of the city. Additional Information Check-in: 3:00 PM Check-out: 11:00 AM House Rules: No smoking, no pets, no parties or events. We strive to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to hosting you and ensuring you have a memorable experience in our charming downtown loft!",
  "address":"5572 North Ridge Road",
  "description":"Charming Downtown Loft with Stunning City Views

Welcome to your cozy retreat in the heart of downtown! Our modern loft offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and convenience, making it an ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers.

The Space
This spacious loft features:

Open Concept Living Area: A beautifully furnished living space with large windows that let in plenty of natural light, offering breathtaking views of the city skyline.
Comfortable Sleeping Arrangements: A plush queen-sized bed with premium linens, plus a sofa bed to accommodate extra guests.
Fully Equipped Kitchen: Stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and all the essentials you need to prepare your favorite meals.
Modern Bathroom: A clean, stylish bathroom with a walk-in shower, fluffy towels, and complimentary toiletries.
Workspace: A dedicated area with a desk and high-speed Wi-Fi, perfect for remote work.
Amenities
High-Speed Wi-Fi
Smart TV with Streaming Services
Washer and Dryer
Air Conditioning and Heating
Free On-Site Parking
Guest Access
Guests have exclusive access to the entire loft, ensuring complete privacy during your stay. You'll also have access to the building's fitness center and rooftop terrace, where you can unwind and enjoy panoramic views of the city.

Neighborhood
Located in a vibrant neighborhood, our loft is just steps away from:

Popular Restaurants and Cafés: Savor local cuisine and coffee at nearby eateries.
Shopping: Explore boutique shops and major retail stores within walking distance.
Cultural Attractions: Visit museums, theaters, and galleries that showcase the city's rich culture and history.
Public Transportation: Easy access to bus and subway lines, making it simple to explore the rest of the city.
Additional Information
Check-in: 3:00 PM
Check-out: 11:00 AM",
  "perks":["wifi","parking","tv","radio","pets","enterence"],
  "extraInfo":"
House Rules: No smoking, no pets, no parties or events.
We strive to make your stay as comfortable and enjoyable as possible. If you have any questions or need assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to hosting you and ensuring you have a memorable experience in our charming downtown loft!",
  "checkIn":"",
  "checkOut":"",
  "maxGuests":"5",
  "price":500,
  "addedPhotos":["https://dalvacation-home-profile.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/The_Lauren_condo_Bethesda_MD_2021-12-12_10-11-55_1.jpg","https://dalvacation-home-profile.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/homeguide-new-apartment-building.jpg","https://dalvacation-home-profile.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/EleanorEmail-847750221ae1499c972c977f279d2d5e.png","https://dalvacation-home-profile.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/istockphoto-1398814566-612x612.jpg","https://dalvacation-home-profile.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/ParkLine-apartment-in-Miami-FL.jpg"]
}
